name: Social Network Links by gol.li
author: David Neustadt

sections.description:
This extension for WordPress 5 integrates the the social network widget of the gol.li service.

To use this extension you will need to have a gol.li account.

gol.li is a free service that allows you to collect and manage your social media profiles
in one place. It supports links to profiles of 30+ social networks.

For further information, please see the terms of use and privacy policy:

https://gol.li/terms

https://gol.li/terms/privacy
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/golli-share directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Find the new widget under Design => Widgets

short_description: Widget for linking social media icons to your profiles through service gol.li
